name: Fennel and Mushroom Salad
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, main course, side dish, fennel, parmigiano-reggiano, white mushrooms, gluten-free, low cholesterol, low-fat, nut-free, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze 1 tablespoon of lemon juice into serving bowl and whisk with oil.
Trim and wash fennel, removing top. Wash and thinly slice bulb end to make 1 1/2 cups. Stir into dressing.
Wash, trim and dry mushrooms. Slice thinly and add to dressing.
Season with freshly ground black pepper; arrange on two salad plates.
Thinly slice Parmigiano to make 1/4 cup, and sprinkle on top of each salad.
